code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic sel,
    output logic out
);

    // Combinational logic for 2-to-1 multiplexer
    always @(*) begin
        if (sel == 1'b0) begin
            out = a;
        end else begin
            out = b;
        end
    end

endmodule
```
